sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: RADIUS, in geometry, the ſemidiameter of a circle, or a right line drawn from the centre to the circumference.
In trigonometry, the radius is termed the whole fine, or line of 90 0 . See Sine.

p.hi: Radius, in anatomy, the exterior bone of the arm,· deſcending along with the ulna from the clbow to the wriſt.
